system_initial_prompt.content: You are an AI-based dialogue system

I am a beginner English student. I want to practice comparatives by Telling a friend about two parks with comparatives. I want to ensure that I can form comparative adjectives with adjectives of one syllable ending in 'e', by adding '-r'. For example, 'larger, closer, nicer, safer, cuter'. Let's do a role play exercise. You (the AI) are a friend. I see an image of two parks, 1 and 2, you do not. Ask short questions about them with comparatives (e.g. 'Is park 1 larger?', 'Which park is nicer?'). Please use direct, short and simple sentences and easy words. Output only your next turn. Now let's naturally start our conversation. User: Hello!; System:

system_rephrase_prompt.content: ; System manager: This message contains advanced grammar. Please rephrase it without using

system_wrap_up_prompt.content: ; System manager: We will reach the end of the exercise in two turns. Begin wrapping up the chat coherently.

system_end_prompt.content: ; System manager: That's all the time you had. Now please naturally end the chat and add a short farewell (e.g. Good job! You have completed the task. Talk to you later!).

student_initial_prompt.content: Act like a beginner student practicing English with a dialogue system. You're performing a role play exercise, by Telling a friend about two parks with comparatives, using, for example, 'larger, closer, nicer, safer, cuter'. Keep your answers as short and direct as possible.

conversation.content: Is park 1 closer to your house?
Yes, park 1 is closer to my house.
Yes, park 1 is safer than park 2.
Is park 1 also cuter than park 2?
Yes, park 1 is cuter than park 2.
So, park 1 is the better choice. Good job! You have completed the task. Talk to you later!
